author: Staff Reporter
text:
The corporation has fined Rs. 25,000 on Diamond Enterprises and cancelled the licence for its vehicle to operate in the city to clean septic tanks and carry sewage.

A release from the civic body said that after environment activists and public had found a lorry of Diamond Enterprises used for illegally dumping sewage into a water body in the outskirts of the city, they had lodged a complaint with the police.

In the process of enquiry, it came to light that the company had violated its contract with the corporation by not only dumping sewage into the water but also using the registered vehicle outside the city limits.

Therefore, the corporation had slapped the fine and cancelled the contract for the vehicle.
title: Contractor’s licence cancelled
